resources.string: Unable to confirm that the application is licensed. Please purchase it from Android Market. If you have, please check that there is a network connection available, and retry this licence check.
Unable to validate license. Check to see if a network connection is available.
Permission is needed to write to the filesystem in order to download files
Clearing any failed uploads from the server
Cleared %1$d failed uploads from the server
Warning\nServer did not report available image sizes.
No app could be found to handle this action.
No app could be found to rate this app. Thanks for trying though.
Download cancelled. Required FileSystem permissions are not available.
Download cancelled. Required FileSystem permissions are not available. As an alternative to system wide permissions, re-select the folder to use in the app preferences.
Allow data retrieval from the server?
Only use data already cached on this device?
Cache cleared. All images will be downloaded from the remote server when next requested.
Cache could not be cleared at this time. If the problem continues, please report the error.
Video Cache cleared. All videos will be downloaded from the remote server when next requested.
Video Cache could not be cleared at this time. If the problem continues, please report the error.
%1$d files already exist on the server. Their permissions will be altered to reflect those selected here, and they will be linked to this album if needed.

Upload complete. Files that could not be uploaded remain in the list for retry if wanted. If any actions are incomplete, you can\'t add new files to the upload list. Click upload button to complete them.
Upload failed due to error in PIWIGO server (%1$d : %2$s).
Upload failed due to web server error (%1$d : %2$s).
Upload failed due to error processing PIWIGO response. This is probably due to a PIWIGO API change. Unparseable response : %1$s.
Upload of chunk for file %1$s failed. Abandoning upload of file.
File %1$s is no longer available on the device.Perhaps it has been deleted or moved.\n%2$s
Uploaded file %1$s is already present on the server, action cancelled.
Upload file %1$s failed due to error in PIWIGO server (%2$d : %3$s).
Upload file %1$s failed due to web server error (%2$d : %3$s).
Upload file %1$s failed due to error processing PIWIGO response. This is probably due to a PIWIGO API change. Unparsable response : %2$s.
Unable to correctly set permissions on gallery. Deleted again. Please try again. If the error continues, raise an issue with this app so we can improve it, and perform the step manually.

This will delete the job status from this device. You will need to manually cleanup any files partially uploaded to the server (or use the preference in this app - upload settings page). Jobs will often complete successfully if you resume them later. Are you sure you wish to take this drastic step?
Too many users to handle. Please submit an enhancement request to enable paging of users.
This will delete the item permanently from the server. Continue?
This will delete the items permanently from the server. Continue?
You\'ve requested to delete %1$d resources that are shared with other albums. Do you wish to delete these from all albums (and the server - permanently), or just unlink them from this album?
You\'ve requested to delete %1$d resources. Do you wish to delete these from all albums (and the server) - permanently, or just unlink them from this tag?

You\'ve requested to delete %1$d resources. Do you wish to delete these from all albums (and the server) - permanently? (You cannot remove tags from images without the UserTags plugin installed on your server)

"End­User License Agreement (\"Agreement\")
** Sourcecode: https://github.com/extorn/piwigo-client
** Last updated: 18 September 2020
Please read this End­User License Agreement (\"Agreement\") carefully before clicking the \"I Agree\" button, downloading or using Piwigo Client (\"Application\").
By clicking the \"I Agree\" button, downloading or using the Application, you are agreeing to be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement. If you do not agree to the terms of this Agreement, do not click on the \"I Agree\" button and do not download or use the Application.
If you are considering using this app to access and or amend a server used for commercial purposes it is essential that you read and understand the limitations on liability. You must test this on a non production server to your satisfaction before accepting any risk and liability yourself based on your decisions. This app has been designed primarily for non-commercial purposes.
** Definitions
Licensee: The licensee is the person or company who intend to use the licensed software or already uses it legally or illegally. The term “licensee” does not imply that the software is legally licensed by default.
** License
Gareth Deli grants you a revocable, non­exclusive, non­transferable, limited license to download, install and use the Application solely for your personal, or commercial purposes strictly in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.
THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED \"AS IS\", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE SOFTWARE
** Restrictions
You agree not to, and you will not permit others to: a) license, sell, rent, lease, assign, distribute, transmit, host, outsource, disclose or otherwise commercially exploit the Application or make the Application available to any third party. b) create derivative works based on this application.
** User Data Collection
Firebase integration has been added to this application to facilitate tracking use of the application with the main purposes being more efficient bug resolution and ascertaining the way the app is being used. The minimum data required to achieve this purpose will be collected.
** Limited Warranty and Disclaimer
The software is provided \“as is\” and the licensee uses it at his/her own risk. Gareth Deli makes no warranties to its use, to its performance or to its fitness for a particular purpose. It is always possible that software contains errors (bugs) and fails to work. Therefore Gareth Deli doesn't warrant that the software is completely error free, or that it works without interruption with all computers and configurations.
It is solely in the licensee’s responsibility to check if the software fits his particular purpose or meets his functional and performance requirements. The licensee is also obliged to test how the software works on his devices and his configurations; test all use cases and check if data processed without errors and as desired before they use the software in production environments. This is of vital importance if using the software for commercial purposes.
** Limitations on Liability
The licensee is responsible for the consequences of use of the software and the thereby resulting direct and indirect damages as far as it is legally possible. The liability is limited to the purchase price as far as it is legally possible; otherwise it is limited to the legally possible minimum.
** Maintenance and Support
Gareth Deli provides general support for the current version of the software through email only. Older versions are not supported.
** Modifications to Application
Gareth Deli reserves the right to modify, suspend or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the Application or any service to which it connects, with or without notice and without liability to you.
** Term and Termination
This Agreement shall remain in effect until terminated by you or Gareth Deli.
Gareth Deli may, in its sole discretion, at any time and for any or no reason, suspend or terminate this Agreement with or without prior notice. This Agreement will terminate immediately, without prior notice from Gareth Deli, in the event that you fail to comply with any provision of this Agreement. You may also terminate this Agreement by deleting the Application and all copies thereof from your mobile device or from your desktop. Upon termination of this Agreement, you shall cease all use of the Application and delete all copies of the Application from your mobile device or from your desktop.
** Severability
If any provision of this Agreement is held to be unenforceable or invalid, such provision will be changed and interpreted to accomplish the objectives of such provision to the greatest extent possible under applicable law and the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.
** Amendments to this Agreement
Gareth Deli reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to modify or replace this Agreement at any time. You will be notified of the change on opening the application, and have the option to either accept the changes, or stop using the application.
** Contact Information
If you have any questions about this Agreement, please contact us."

"This app was written to allow me easier access to my Piwigo photo gallery while on the move.
Sourcecode: https://github.com/extorn/piwigo-client
No further updates are planned for this app, thank you for you support if you have purchased a copy. Without paid users I would have stopped development on this app a long time ago. I am currently working through bugs as they crop up and releasing them, sometimes new features get added. Essentially, the app works, and what it does to the server it does correctly, but, my lack of Android development experience shows and it does crash sometimes.
If you're able to establish a set of steps that always cause a crash, please drop me an email or raise an issue on my github project page to assist me in fixing it.
In August 2018, a user, David Klement, came back to me with screen mock-ups for a more professional design. Starting with release 1.3.95, I have been incorporating those ideas, starting with the album view screen. These full list of proposed screen designs are available to view on the app website (https://api-8938561204297001672-604498.firebaseapp.com/design-proposals/index.html).
NOTE: Language translations are performed using www.Deepl.com or google translate websites. If you spot any obvious errors, please let me know so I can correct them.
There are two versions, a free version (with advertisements) and a paid version (free of advertisements). You are free to choose which you prefer. You cannot 'upgrade' the free version at present, install the paid version, and delete the free version. Note: The versions will diverge over time. Most changes will be made to both free and paid versions.
Presently, the paid version has added support for tags: Piwigo supports tags to a degree out of the box, but the User Tags plugin adds more features (basic testing performed). If there is a feature with regards tags that you want but the app doesn't provide, please ask.
At the moment, it provides a basic level of functionality to allow navigation around an existing gallery, upload of new photos and videos, and creating new categories within a gallery. Some fields can be amended once created, but many are still read only.... for now!
Please can I ask that if you uninstall the app, you use the link on the app menu to email me telling me why the app did not meet your needs so I can address this.
The version of the PIWIGO server I test against is currently 11.0.3.
My test gallery contains .jpg and .mp4 and .m4v files only. If yours contains others, you may well encounter problems - if so, please tell me and I'll prioritise work on those file types.
I have been testing with a copy of the piwigo_privacy plugin installed and also the VideoJS plugin installed. * Note: I have had to request some changes to the privacy plugin for some recent changes. If you're having issues with this plugin, I might well be able to help (this plugin is not my work though).
I have a copy of the Extended Description plugin installed, and have added support for some of the features it supplies, but it will require that you install my plugin on your server - PiwigoClientWsExts.
Please report any drop me an email if you encounter any bugs. I\'ve tested this on the android emulator, a Samsung phone and a Samsung tablet, but it\'s my first app so I\'m sure things will go wrong for someone.
A big thank you to everyone who has emailed me with suggestions or bugs. I will endeavor to address all of your suggestions as soon as practical.
Please do choose to report every crash that occurs. If you find the bug still occurs after the next update, please take the time to email me. It's likely I need a little bit more context around what is happening just before the bug occurs.
Releases are on an ad-hoc basis at the moment. The frequency of releases is expected to reduce as the app matures. The release schedule and history is shown below. This may change and things may get delayed, but you can see what's on the list."
Licences for resources used within this App

If you choose to lock the app, the app will allow read only access to the gallery only. Changing ratings of images etc is disabled, and access to the app settings is removed. To unlock you will need to provide your current PIWIGO user password.
Enter the PIWIGO password for %1$s to re-enable full access to all features of this app and click unlock.
The app has now been unlocked
The device is running low on memory (%1$d). The in memory image cache has been cleared.
Please choose the file size you wish to view
The server is running PIWIGO version %1$s. The minimum version tested with this app is %2$s. Some features in the app may not work as expected. Please check the about page for any identified issues.
The thumbnail size you have selected is not natively supported by the server you are connected to. The server will return the \"nearest match\" sized image.
Error while deleting group (%1$s). Please retry.
Error while deleting user (%1$s). Please retry.
Are you sure you want to delete this group? Any users that are members of it will not be deleted, but may lose access to the areas of the gallery this group has.
Are you sure you want to delete this user?
Sorry, you cannot delete the user you\'re logged in as (%1$s).
Permission is needed to read the filesystem in order to select and upload files
%1$s permissions are needed for the filesystem. Purpose: %2$s
Local caching of Video files is enabled. To allow this, write access to the file system must be granted. If denied, local caching will be disabled.
Unable to tidy the video cache. If this issue persists, please report it.
Unable to copy file from cache. %1$s
Clear cached data for this resource and force re-download from the server?
Unable to load album permissions details
Without access to the local filesystem, this action cannot proceed. Sorry.
Without access to the local filesystem, this action cannot proceed. As an alternative to system wide permissions, re-select the folder to use in the app preferences.
Only admin users can upload unless the community plugin is installed. Sorry.
This slideshow no longer accurately reflects the current tag contents
App not yet configured and connected to a PIWIGO server. Please open the app manually and configure it before attempting to share items with it.
Unacceptable piwigo server details, please check app connection configuration
Please select an album to upload to
Update album thumbnail to this image?
Are you sure you wish to delete album (%1$s)?\n\nThere is no undo feature
You are deleting album (%1$s) with %2$d photos.\n\nWould you like to permanently delete any orphaned content?
You are deleting album (%1$s) with %2$d photos, and %3$d child albums containing a further %4$d photos.\n\nWould you like to permanently delete any orphaned content?
Copy the %1$d item(s) in the basket here (%2$s)?
Move the %1$d item(s) in the basket here (%2$s)?
You\'ve selected to remove access to this album and navigable access to all child albums from %1$d groups and %2$d users. Continue with this action?
You\'ve selected to add access to this album for %1$d groups and %2$d users. Would you like to apply these changes to the %3$d child albums?
Your changes would have prevented you accessing this album. Your username has been added to the list of those with explicit permission.
Adding permissions to %1$d child albums too.
A name for this album must be provided. Please add one and then try again.
Upload of section of file failed after %1$d attempts. Please restart this upload once complete to retry.
Cannot upload file %1$s as it is missing a file extension, for example .jpg
Verification of file on server failed for upload of %1$s
This file has been partially uploaded. The Upload job is currently paused. The file will be removed from the server when you finish the upload
If you don\'t wish to restart the upload later. You should remove the files from the upload job, then click upload. This will clean the cancelled upload state from the server.
The image size you have selected is not natively supported by the server you are connected to. The server will return the \"nearest match\" sized image.
To allow caching to disk, write access to the file system must be granted. If denied, caching will be in memory.
Call to server cancelled as it took too long to complete.
Caching of videos to disk disabled
Unexpected error calling server or parsing response
Read write access to the cache folder is needed. Check app settings.
Error adding certificate to trust store
Add Certificate chain to list of trusted CAs?\n\n
HTTP Engine shutdown. Will be restarted automatically as needed.
Resetting the list of certificates chosen to be trusted
Delete all files selected for upload?

Cancelling a file upload after it has been partially transferred to the server will result in the partial upload remaining on the server. Manually clean the upload folder on the server (e.g. /var/www/piwigo/upload/buffer) to save space.
Album could not be created, please retry
Album was created, but permissions could not be set. The attempt to delete the partially set up album failed. Please check the server directly.

There were %1$d other users found to share this username (%2$s). The most recent user of this Piwigo server was selected, but this is not safe if it is possible that they will be using the server at the same or similar time. Please consider changing these usernames so username is a unique identifier for a given class of user.
These permissions are needed to start an upload process, and then keep the upload process running once the screen has switched off

Adverts are persistently having problems loading. Please report this to me, as these form an important though very small source of revenue to me.
